summary: Most layout changes are implemented: a new hero video section is added before OpeningSection, the background photo section text is updated, and the ‚ÄúOur Moments Together üíñ‚Äù section is replaced with exactly two clickable cards that navigate to a separate gallery screen. However, the new gallery page does not meet the ‚ÄúONLY 4‚Äì5 photos / no extra content‚Äù and ‚Äúrender only existing assets (no broken slots)‚Äù requirements based on the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Gallery page/screen displays ONLY 4‚Äì5 uploaded photos (no extra content) and renders only real uploaded photo assets without placeholders; if fewer than 4 photos exist, render only the available photos.
missing_requirements.reason: GalleryPage renders additional non-photo content (title, subtitle, bottom message, footer) and hardcodes 5 photo paths without any existence check/fallback; this can render broken images if some assets are missing, violating the ‚Äòonly available uploaded photos‚Äô / ‚Äòno placeholders‚Äô behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce clean media rendering: do not auto-generate any additional image/video placeholders anywhere; missing assets should result in rendering nothing or only valid media.
missing_requirements.reason: GalleryPage always maps over a fixed list of 5 image paths with no verification that the files exist; if any are missing, the UI will still render elements for them (effectively creating empty/broken media tiles).

hallucinated_features.description: Gallery page includes additional content beyond the requested photo-only gallery: page title, subtitle, bottom message, and a footer with an external caffeine.ai link.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-20 specifies the new gallery page should display ONLY 4‚Äì5 uploaded photos (with soft heart animations). The added headings/messages/footer go beyond ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù photos.
